item.description:
Join Americans for Prosperity - New Hampshire for a free family BBQ and night of fun!

AFP NH State Director Corey R. Lewandowski will be speaking about our work here in New Hampshire, and how you can help us fight for economic freedom.

Various candidates for office will also be speaking.

If you'd like to relax, learn about Americans for Prosperity - NH, and meet other like-minded activists, don't miss this event!

The menu will include hamburgers, hot dogs, baked beans, potato salad, etc. There will also be children's entertainment, so feel free to bring the whole family.

Please RSVP, and feel free to invite others.

What is AFP?
Americans for Prosperity is committed to educating citizens about economic policy and mobilizing those citizens as advocates in the public policy process. AFP is an organization of grassroots leaders who engage citizens in the name of limited government and free markets on the local, state, and federal levels. AFP grassroots activists advocate for public policies that champion the principles of entrepreneurship and fiscal and regulatory restraint.
item.name: Americans for Prosperity Free Family BBQ and Fun Night
